title: Ticket #5998: VM universe should respect request_[cpu, memory]
description: Right now, the VM GAHP (and universe) only pays attention to ATTR_JOB_VM_MEMORY and (the entirely undocumented) ATTR_JOB_VM_VCPUs when starting a VM. It should no longer be an error to omit VM memory (in condor_submit or the startd or the starter); instead, the VM GAHP, if ATTR_JOB_VM_MEMORY is unset, should use ATTR_REQUEST_MEMORY; and should use ATTR_REQUEST_CPUS if ATTR_JOB_VM_VCPUS is unset.
